notes.text: The test lasts 30 minutes. The timer starts ticking when you click Letâ€™s Begin.
The test consists of 30 questions. They are not arranged by complexity.
You can go back to the previous questions.
Each correct answer brings you 1 point, wrong - 0 points, unanswered - 0 points.
Please make sure you are not interrupted during the test, as the timer cannot be paused once started.
Please ensure you have a stable internet connection.

instructions.text: You can start the test by pressing the button below. Before that, here are some tips for better performance:
